title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 10 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Adventures at Sea: Life Aboard a 19th Century Sailing Ship      Time: 2:15 PM to 3:00 PM Location: On BALCLUTHA Fees: Vessel Admission: $10, Free for visitors 15 and younger     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 04/27/2016 to 04/27/2017 Guided tour of the historic sailing ship BALCLUTHA. View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Historic Waterfront Walking Tour      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Argonaut Hotel Lobby Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 02/21/2015 to 12/17/2017 Park Ranger-led, hour long tour of San Francisco`s northern waterfront. View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Rangers in the Rig      Time: 11:00 AM to 11:45 AM Location: Balclutha Fees: Ship Admission: $10, Free for 16 and under     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join park rangers on board the sailing ship Balclutha for an aloft demonstration. View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Steam-Powered Donkey Engine Demonstration      Time: 11:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Entrance to Hyde Street Pier Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join park staff for a demonstration and ranger talk about the park’s steam powered donkey engine. This program involves steaming up the boiler and operating this historic piece of machinery. The engine will be running 11:00-4:00. View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Go Sailing on SF Bay Aboard Historic Scow Schooner ALMA      Time: 12:30 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Hyde Street Pier Fees: Adult $40; Senior (62+) $30; Child (6-15) $20; Under 6 free with adult.     Friday, August 19, 2016 Sail San Francisco Bay aboard the 1891 National Landmark scow schooner ALMA! View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Free Festival of the Sea Returns to Hyde Street Pier      Time: 9:30 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Hyde Street Pier Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Full-Day Event Celebrates the NPS Centennial and the 1895 Schooner C.A. Thayer With Traditional Music, Educational Programs, and Activities for All Ages Saturday, August 20, 2016 at San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park  View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Maritime Crafts in the Maritime Museum      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Maritime Museum lobby Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Every 3rd Sunday of every month. from 02/21/2016 to 02/18/2018 Create a "fancy work" craft. This may include knot tying, also known as macrame, and "scrimshaw." View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Healthy Parks, Healthy People Walks      Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Varies, see event description Fees: FREE     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Join a guided exercise and history walk with park interpreters. Get outside, get some exercise and meet new people. Walking route or exercise activities change monthly. View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Crafts for Kids      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM Location: Entrance to Hyde Street Pier Fees: Free     Sunday, September 4, 2016 Every 1st Sunday of every month. from 10/04/2015 to 12/04/2016 Learn a little about life at sea and make a maritime craft! View Details      San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park Chantey Sing      Time: 8:00 PM to 12:00 PM Location: Hyde Street Pier Fees: Free. Reservation required, call 415/561-7171. If emailing, be sure to include your name in the body of the message to hold the reservation.     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Monthly sing-a-long aboard a historic ship.  View Details
